name: Solo Adventure
description:
Is a leisurely and enjoyable game that you can play for a considerable amount of time.

  • Genre - Shooter Video Game, Casual game, Adventure 
  • Survive until you die.
  • Enemy will drop gem, and if player collect it will increase their exp to level up.
  • Level up will show up the upgrade for you to choose.
  • Different upgrades will have different effect.
